info.author: David Meyer
info.description:
# BioInformatics Tools

## Installation

```bash
python3 -m pip install bioinfo-toolset
```

## Usage

```bash
bit --help
```

## Example

```bash
bit vep -l ENST00000257430.9:c.3927_3931del
```
